question: Has tocilizumab been assessed against Covid-19?
ideal_answer: Preliminary clinical results have indicated that tocilizumab, can improve the outcomes of patients with severe or critical COVID-19 while maintaining a good safety profile.

snippets.text: Preliminary clinical results have indicated that antagonism of the IL-6 receptor (IL-6R), including with the FDA-approved humanized monoclonal antibody tocilizumab, can improve the outcomes of patients with severe or critical COVID-19 while maintaining a good safety profile.
